SELECT a.user_account clientAccount, a.user_name clientName, a.sex sex, a.phone phone, a.email clientEmail, a.id_card idCard, a.user_code userId, a.version version FROM t_sys_user a, t_sys_client b, t_sys_store c WHERE a.is_deleted = 0 AND a.role = 3 AND a.user_code = b.user_id AND b.invite_code = c.invite_code
and a.user_name like concat('%', #{clientName}, '%')
and a.user_account like concat('%',#{clientAccount},'%')
and c.user_id=#{userId}
order by a.update_time desc
